title: Martin Luther King: American Prophet  2008 03 29  (BBC 2)
description:
Martin Luther King: American Prophet  2008 03 29  (BBC 2)


488.44 mgs
XviD 1.0.3
60 mins.


?Since his assassination in 1968, Martin Luther King has become known and celebrated throughout the world as a champion of freedom, a secular icon of human rights. But there&#039;s another side to this man that&#039;s in danger of being forgotten - King the raging prophet of God&#039;s judgement on the West, the Baptist pastor who said that his mission was &#039;to redeem the soul of America&#039;.

Forty years after his death, politician and campaigner, Oona King, who has strong family links with MLK and the civil rights movement, goes on a journey through the Deep South in search of this aspect of his leadership. Along the way she meets a wide range of Martin Luther King&#039;s friends and colleagues, including his right-hand man, former Ambassador Andrew Young. Armed with her own questions about religion and its role in society, Oona explores with them the deep roots of King&#039;s thought and action. What kind of religion did he believe in? What made him tick? And what do we lose if we ignore King&#039;s spiritual, mystical vision??
